languages.text: {n}Железный кулак чуть разжимается.{/n} "Никогда бы не подумал, что от наивных речей мне станет легче. Видимо, совсем сдаю..."
{n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."
languages.original_text: {n}Железный кулак чуть разжимается.{/n} "Никогда бы не подумал, что от наивных речей мне станет легче. Видимо, совсем сдаю..."

{n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの鉄の拳から、わずかに力が抜けた。{/n}「まさか、甘っちょろいきれいごとに慰めを見いだすとは思わなかった…どうやら俺は、本当に自制を失いかけてるみたいだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの鉄の拳から、わずかに力が抜けた。{/n}「まさか、甘っちょろいきれいごとに慰めを見いだすとは思わなかった…どうやら俺は、本当に自制を失いかけてるみたいだ…」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Eisenfaust entspannt sich ein wenig.{/n} "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich einmal Trost in naiven Plattitüden finden würde. Ich verliere offensichtlich die Kontrolle ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Eisenfaust entspannt sich ein wenig.{/n} "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich einmal Trost in naiven Plattitüden finden würde. Ich verliere offensichtlich die Kontrolle ..."

languages.text: {n}Le poing d'acier de Solomorne se desserre légèrement.{/n} « Jamais je n'aurais pensé trouver un quelconque confort dans ce genre de platitudes naïves. Je suis vraiment en train de perdre pied... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le poing d'acier de Solomorne se desserre légèrement.{/n} « Jamais je n'aurais pensé trouver un quelconque confort dans ce genre de platitudes naïves. Je suis vraiment en train de perdre pied... »

languages.text: {n}El puño de hierro de Solomorne se afloja ligeramente.{/n} «Nunca imaginé que me consolaría un tópico tan ingenuo. Es evidente que estoy perdiendo el juicio...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El puño de hierro de Solomorne se afloja ligeramente.{/n} «Nunca imaginé que me consolaría un tópico tan ingenuo. Es evidente que estoy perdiendo el juicio...».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙微微松开了他的铁拳。{/n}“我以前从没想过，我居然会从这种天真的陈词滥调里得到慰藉。显然，我正在失去控制……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙微微松开了他的铁拳。{/n}“我以前从没想过，我居然会从这种天真的陈词滥调里得到慰藉。显然，我正在失去控制……”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un demir yumruğu hafifçe gevşiyor.{/n} "Safça basmakalıp sözlerden teselli bulacağımı asla düşünmezdim. Belli ki ipin ucunu kaçırıyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's iron fist unclenches slightly.{/n} "I never thought I would take comfort in naive platitudes. Clearly, I am losing my grip..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un demir yumruğu hafif gevşer.{/n} "Safça basmakalıp sözlerden teselli bulacağımı asla düşünmezdim. Belli ki ipin ucunu kaçırıyorum..."
